thread.title: The biggest tech deal ever: Dell buys EMC for $67 billion
thread.title_full: The biggest tech deal ever: Dell buys EMC for $67 billion

author: From cnn.com
title: The biggest tech deal ever: Dell buys EMC for $67 billion
text: From cnn.com In the biggest tech deal of all time, Dell announced Monday that it has agreed to buy corporate software, storage and security giant EMC for $67 billion. The deal completes Dell's transformation from a consumer PC business to an IT solutions provider for companies. That process began when Dell bought Perot Systems for $4 billion in 2009 and went full throttle in 2013 when company founder Michael Dell took the business private. EMC is a behemoth of a corporate IT business. It is among the largest providers of storage hardware in the world. It also makes servers and owns security company RSA, which is known for its hard-to-crack SecurID ... (
